Articles.Content:
I love the idea of Kerbals leveling up to have better piloting skills! Looking [even more ] forward to this update!

Me too! One thing I'd like to see though which I don't think is currently in the game is that when the navball switches from orbit mode to target mode, we lose the radial/perpendicular markers - obviously the radial one isn't that useful, but the perpendicular marker would be a massive help, in the sense that it was perpendicular relative to the target. Is this something that could be looked at?
Congrats on getting married tomorrow HarvesteR!
